item.title: Daewoo India launches AGM VRLA Silver+ 2W battery with advanced Korean technology
item.description: The new battery range includes four models: DW2.5LC, DWZ4, DW-Z5, and DW5LB. The batteries combine 24 months of free replacement warranty with an additional 24 months of pro-rata coverage, ensuring customer satisfaction and reliability.

item.title: AI Improves Creativity In Stories, Reduces Diversity: Study
item.description: Stories created with help of ChatGPT are more creative compared to those by writers not using the tool, according to research. However, diversity in stories suffered with the use of AI.

item.title: UK has almost 1m EV chargers, with new public one installed every 25 minutes
item.description:
Electric vehicle industry says spring data shows installations are keeping pace with rising battery sales

There are now almost 1m electric car chargers in the UK, according to data, a figure that the industry argues is proof that installations are keeping pace with increasing sales of battery vehicles.

There were 930,000 UK chargers at the end of June, according to ChargeUK, a lobby group, but the majority of these have been installed in homes and business premises, with only about 65,000 public chargers available.

Continue reading...
